description: This file defines a mock class for the CloudStore implementation, used for unit testing or interface stubbing in the project. It includes mock method declarations for various store-related interfaces.

classes.name: CloudStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing multiple store interfaces for testing purposes.

methods.name: ~CloudStoreImplementationMock
methods.description: Destructor for the mock class, defaulted.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration method for IStore notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration method for IStore notifications.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a value in the store with namespace and key.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value from the store.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a specific key in the store.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of an entire namespace.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration method for IStore2 notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration method for IStore2 notifications.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a value with scope, namespace, key, value, and TTL.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value with scope, namespace, key, and TTL.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a key within a specific scope.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a namespace within a specific scope.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieving keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieving namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting storage limit for a namespace.
